description: This table contains information on a patient's written languages.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number associated with the list of written languages selected

columns.name: PAT_WRITTEN_LANG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Patient's written language


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
